name: Ears and Burgers
summary: You're looking at a unique cooking game full of capricious little rabbits and huge stacks of food. These weird little buddies are eager to taste the delicious human food: hamburgers, sandwiches, pizza, sushi, and tacos. And, of course, the more the better. They are real gluttons. And, to be honest, quite sensitive as well. So, please, do not even dare to add the wrong ingredient. Because the consequences will be unpredictable. No kidding. You are officially warned.
